Title: A Comprehensive Survey on Machine Learning Applications in Healthcare
Authors: Smith, John; Johnson, Mary; Williams, Robert
Abstract: This paper presents a comprehensive survey of machine learning applications in healthcare, covering diagnosis, treatment recommendation, and patient monitoring.
Keywords: machine learning; healthcare; medical informatics; artificial intelligence

Title: Deep Learning for Medical Image Analysis: A Systematic Review
Journal: Proceedings of the International Conference on Medical Imaging
Abstract: A systematic review of deep learning techniques applied to medical image analysis, including classification, segmentation, and detection tasks.
Keywords: deep learning; medical imaging; convolutional neural networks; systematic review

Title: Natural Language Processing in Clinical Decision Support Systems
Abstract: This study explores the use of natural language processing techniques in clinical decision support systems to improve patient outcomes.
Keywords: natural language processing; clinical decision support; electronic health records

Title: Predictive Analytics in Hospital Resource Management
Abstract: An examination of predictive analytics techniques for optimizing hospital resource allocation and improving operational efficiency.
Keywords: predictive analytics; hospital management; resource optimization; healthcare operations

Title: Federated Learning for Privacy-Preserving Healthcare Analytics
Authors: Zhang, Wei; Liu, Xiaoming; Chen, Yun
Abstract: This paper introduces a federated learning framework for healthcare analytics that preserves patient privacy while enabling collaborative model training.
Keywords: federated learning; privacy preservation; healthcare analytics; distributed learning
